name: 24-Hour Growth
description:
Description

24-Hour Growth is a mini idle game about growing a virtual sunflower over 24 hours. That's it! ^^

Just remember to water it and give it sunlight every once in a while!
(Auto Save is included!)

Enjoy :)

Hotkeys

TAB - Switch color palette

ESC - Closes the game

MB left - Interact with buttons

CTRL + R - Deletes your save and plants a new sunflower
